name: Space Crisis
description:
The enemy is attacking in the spaceship.
You are a combatant, so you have to fight.


The game is easy to operate.
You can play with direction button and 2 buttons.
Please see the following for the operation method.

Direction: move
X: Attack
A: Crouch



Feature:
・Smooth animation
　·space
・Shoot a gun
・Action games
16-bit graphic
